issue: Hardcoded fallback encryption key 'liquid-spark-secure-key-2024' in source code
fixRecommendation: Remove hardcoded fallback key. Environment variable should be required, not have a fallback.

issue: Hardcoded fallback encryption key 'vueni-secure-key-2024' in source code
fixRecommendation: Remove hardcoded fallback key. Make environment variable mandatory for production use.

issue: CSP directive allows 'unsafe-inline' and 'unsafe-eval' for scripts - major security risk for financial platform
fixRecommendation: Remove 'unsafe-inline' and 'unsafe-eval' from script-src. Use nonces or hashes for inline scripts instead.

issue: 19 duplicate insight page components causing 94KB bundle bloat - InsightsPage, NewInsightsPage, RefinedInsightsPage, etc.
fixRecommendation: Consolidate to 2-3 core components: BaseInsightsPage, EnhancedInsightsPage, and ConfigurableInsightsPage with variant props

issue: 11 duplicate card components - ComprehensiveEcoCard exists in both insights/ and insights/components/
fixRecommendation: Remove duplicate implementations and flatten component structure

issue: CVE-2024-GHSA-67mh-4wv8-2f99 in esbuild via vite@5.4.19
fixRecommendation: Update vite from ^5.4.1 to ^6.2.0 to resolve esbuild security vulnerability

issue: 18 markdown documentation files in root directory causing repository bloat
fixRecommendation: Consolidate documentation into /docs directory structure

issue: 11 calculator components completely lack individual React component tests
fixRecommendation: Create comprehensive test suites for each calculator with input validation, calculation accuracy, and accessibility testing

issue: GlassSlider components missing aria-label for screen readers on all financial calculators
fixRecommendation: Add aria-label and aria-valuetext to all slider components for accessibility compliance

issue: Security wrapper component has no unit tests despite critical security function
fixRecommendation: Create comprehensive tests for input sanitization, rate limiting, CSRF protection

issue: Duplicate toast hook implementation - exists in both hooks/ and components/ui/
fixRecommendation: Remove one implementation and update imports to use single source

issue: Environment variable name mismatch - vercel.json uses 'VITE_ENCRYPTION_KEY' but code uses 'VITE_VUENI_ENCRYPTION_KEY'
fixRecommendation: Standardize environment variable naming to match code usage

issue: 9 transaction components with overlapping functionality causing redundancy
fixRecommendation: Consolidate to UnifiedTransactionList.tsx with variant props

issue: TypeScript unused variables rule disabled globally, reducing code quality enforcement
fixRecommendation: Enable '@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars': 'warn' and fix actual unused imports

issue: Budget, credit score, and investment services missing comprehensive unit tests
fixRecommendation: Add tests for service layer CRUD operations, persistence, encryption, and error handling

issue: Weak CSRF token generation using Math.random()
fixRecommendation: Use crypto.getRandomValues() for cryptographically secure random number generation

issue: Use of dangerouslySetInnerHTML with dynamic content
fixRecommendation: Validate and sanitize the CSS content before injecting, or use safer method

issue: SVG circular progress chart lacks accessibility attributes
fixRecommendation: Add role='img', aria-label='Eco score X out of 100', and aria-describedby

issue: @hookform/resolvers@3.9.0 significantly outdated (latest: 5.1.1)
fixRecommendation: Update to @hookform/resolvers@^5.1.1 for security patches and compatibility

issue: Source maps disabled in production build may hinder debugging
fixRecommendation: Consider enabling external source maps for production debugging

issue: Barrel export file exports many components causing potential bundle bloat
fixRecommendation: Implement tree-shaking friendly exports or remove unused exports
